titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a deduction for estate tax purposes equal to the value of the decedent's individual retirement plans, section 401(k) plans, and certain other retirement plans.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 6/8/1999--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit the deduction of the value of certain retirement plans of a decedent from the value of the taxable estate.
